task.title: Restore a deleted volume
task.shortdesc: You can restore a volume in the system if it has been deleted but not yet purged. The system automatically purges a volume approximately eight hours after it has been deleted. If the system has purged the volume, you cannot restore it.

step.cmd: Click the Deleted tab to view the list of deleted volumes.
Click the Actions icon for the volume you want to restore.
In the resulting menu, click Restore.

step.stepresult: The volume is placed in the Active volumes list and iSCSI connections to the volume are restored.
